title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled "Error".
OB: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. The error message is not clear or informative.
EB: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then trying to switch back to the Layout view, the user should be prompted to save the changes or discard them. The error message should clearly indicate the need to save the changes and provide appropriate options.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the XML Report Designer.
2. Switch to the "source" view of the Layout Editor.
3. Make changes to the XML.
4. Try to switch back to the Layout view. 
Expected behavior: An error message is displayed indicating the need to save the changes, with appropriate options to save or discard the changes.
